content: Xingxing WeiSearch this siteEmbedded FilesSkip to main contentSkip to navigationHomepage of Xingxing WeiÂ Â Xingxing Wei (éŸ¦æ˜Ÿæ˜Ÿ)Â Professor/Ph.D. advisorxxwei@buaa.edu.cnBeihang UniversityBeijing, ChinaGoogle Scholar,Â  Â  DBLP,Â  Â  BUAA HomepageIÂ  am now a full professor at School of Artificial Intelligence, also a member in State Key Laboratory of Virtual Reality Technology and Systems, Beihang University (BUAA), China.Â  My research interests include: Â Computer Vision, Trustworthy AI, etc. I lead a research group named ROSE Vision Lab, whose website can be found in https://rose-vision.github.io/.Â  If you are interested in my research, please contactÂ  me!Â BiographyI joined in BUAA in September, 2019 as an Associate Professor, and was promoted to Professor in 2024. From 2017 to 2019, I was a PostDoc in the Department of Computer Science and Technology at Tsinghua University, working with Prof. Jun Zhu. Prior to this, I worked in Alibaba group, as a senior algorithm engineer. In July 2015, I obtained my PhD degree in School of Computer Science and Technology at Tianjin University, supervised by Prof. Xiaochun Cao. In July 2010, I received my bachelor degree in School of Automation and Electrical Engineering at Beihang University, supervised by Prof. Haibin Duan. From 2012 to 2015, I spent three happy years at Institute of Information Engineering, Chinese Academy of Sciences, as a visiting student.Â NewsğŸ‰ 2025-08: One paper was accepted by IEEE TPAMI (CCF A)!
